entry.title: Bringing mental health data to doctors
entry.summary:
Description

There is an edge to gain from the vast amounts of data in Healthcare. It’s now possible to continuously monitor patients’ health, but where to begin? What data is useful to a doctor who is not trained in mental health care? How do you make findings actionable? In this session, you’ll hear about lessons learned in starting, scaling, & optimizing data science initiatives at a growing tech company.
